Description: After removing the database ensure that update takes place without problems, in a single step

Get an image and fill the photo with tapped areas and save, test the up/down arrows, scrolling collection views, going in/out of Match VCs, remove add tap areas, and finally remove all tap areas and Match assoc (verify in simulator DB that all components got removed)
Switch between views, for each scroll fast down and then back up, randomly scroll a few collection views (if applicable), and randomly go in/out of child controllers
Create a temporary color association of at least 5 elements and delete all of them
Create a temporary match association of at least 5 taps and delete all of them
Create a temporary color association and add/change/delete each time saving association name, keywords, and comments
Create a temporary color association and use buttons to modify the type, coverage, and apply renaming (where applicable)
Create a temporary color association and add multiple refs/mixes, change the orders, and delete a few elements (saving after each time)
Attempt accessing all links (About/Disclaimer page) and sharing site to Mail, Messenger, Twitter, and Facebook
Test the DATABASE UPDATE SETTINGS (ensuring that the pop-ups appear, depending on the settings)
Test the READ-ONLY SETTINGS  for Paint Swatches and Mix Associations
Test the TAP AREA SETTINGS (tap area shape and shape size should be set accordingly)
Test the MATCH FILTERS (number of matches and filters should be set accordingly) and test the PAINT/RGB DISPLAY settings
Test the DEFAULT PAINT MIX RATIOS (in particular, add ratios with padded spaces, add extra newlines before/between/after, add empty elements)
Test the ALERT SETTINGS (ensure in particular that alerts are turned off with the appropriate settings)
Test the DEFAULT LIST VIEW ensuring the App switches to the new view set and goes back to it after reload
Ensure that the Photo Library and Camera are not presented when the Photo and Camera settings are turned off
Ensure that the appropriate pop-ups come up when internet connectivity is turned off (i.e., settings in Airplane mode)

Test landscape orientation/rotation: Start out reload in landscape and traverse all the VCs (rotating periodically back to portrait). Ensure that all view components render correctly including letter indexes and table headers (for Image VC landscape is disabled)
Home and Back button: Test this functionality in all applicable view controllers
